root: ^In order to use a card, you click it. Some cards require you to indicate the target location, while others may immediately activate.
^You can right-click the card to see it in more detail. You may also hover over the symbols and keywords to fully understand what they mean.
^cards use Energy Points (EP) and like MP, each character has their own pool, and you regain it at the beginning of your next turn.
^Use the highlighted card on the guard
